payload.name: communication-avoiding-algorithms
payload.title: Communication‑avoiding algorithms: minimize bytes moved per unit of progress
payload.formal: in distributed systems, cost is dominated by communication (C) not compute (W). Many optimal algorithms minimize (C) even if (W) rises.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2 already does the canonical comm‑avoid trick: **CAS + hashes**. Tool protocol passes prompt hashes and artifact hashes rather than raw bodies; the ledger stores small event payloads and references. Extend this principle to **authority**: minimize *capability movement* too—delegation should be rare, attenuated, and auditable.
